name: Lost Moorings
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the current Act #.
[tablet]: -2. If this test fails, take 1 damage.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 1 more than the current Act #.
[tablet]: -3. If this test fails, take 1 damage.

name: Going Twice
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 4 - the number of cards in the Auction Deck.
[cultist]: -1. If you fail lose a resource for each point you failed by.
[tablet]: -2. -4 instead if there are no resources on an Auction Lot card in play.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 5 - the number of cards in the Auction Deck.
[cultist]: -2. If you fail lose a resource for each point you failed by.
[tablet]: -3. -5 instead if there are no resources on an Auction Lot card in play.

flavor: The strange statuette isn't as easy to hold as it looks. Your fingers appear to bend around the idol, gripping it from impossible positions.
name: Warped Idol
text: Increase the modifier of each [tablet] token revealed at your location by 1. (Example: -3 becomes -2) [reaction] When you would move from a location, exhaust Warped Idol: This movement ignores all attacks of opportunity and effects on scenario cards that would trigger from that movement.

name: Private Lives
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of revealed locations with no clues on them (max -4).
[cultist]: -2. If a [[Conspirator]] enemy is at your location, lose 1 resource.
[tablet]: -2. -4 instead if your location is Non-Euclidean.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the number of revealed locations with no clues on them.
[cultist]: -3. If a [[Conspirator]] enemy is at your location, lose 1 resource.
[tablet]: -3. -5 instead if your location is non-Euclidean.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location.

flavor: Wycliffe's silver ring is engraved with a Latin inscription circling the outside: "Virtue Silentio Amore."
name: Wycliffe's Ring
text:
You get +2 maximum hand size.
Encounter cards do not count toward your maximum hand size.
[reaction] When an encounter card is added to the hand of an investiagtor at your location, exhaust Wycliffe's Ring: Draw a card.

name: Crumbling Masonry
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 4 - the number of cards in the Traitor Deck.
[cultist]: -2. -4 instead if there is a [[Traitor]] enemy in play.
[tablet]: -2. If this test fails, place 1 doom on the furthest [[Conspirator]] or [[Cultist]] enemy from you.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you have 1 or more encounter cards in your hand, take 1 horror.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 5 - the number of cards in the Traitor Deck.
[cultist]: -3. -5 instead if there is a [[Traitor]] enemy in play.
[tablet]: -3. If this test fails, place 1 doom on the furthest [[Conspirator]] or [[Cultist]] enemy from you.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you have 1 or more encounter cards in your hand, take 1 horror.

name: Ulysses Hill
text: Aloof. Forced - When any amount of doom is placed on another enemy in play: Either place 1 doom on Ulysses Hill or he readies and attacks each investigator at his location (choose one).

name: Hector Sutton
text: Hunter. Aloof. Hector Sutton's location and each connecting location gains "Non-Euclidean - Look at the top card of your deck. If it is not a weakness, remove it from the game."

name: Wallace Thorpe
text: Hunter. Alert. Forced - After you succeed at attacking Wallace Thorpe by 1 or more: Seal all tokens revealed during that attack on Wallace Thorpe instead of returning them to the chaos bag. [action]: Test [intellect](3). If you succeed, release all tokens sealed on Wallace Thorpe. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Rodney Duvall
text: Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - After Rodney Duvall attacks (even if that attack was canceled): Rodney Duvall disengages and moves to a connecting location (empty if possible).

name: Glen Conroy
text:
Hunter. Aloof.
Each other non-weakness enemy at Glen Conroy's location and each connecting location gets +1 fight and deals +1 damage.

name: Paul Kellerman
text:
Aloof.
Each investigator gets -2 skill value during revelation effects and [action] abilities on encounter cards.

flavor: Square your actions by the square of virtue with all mankind.
name: Compass of the Grand Lodge
text:
[reaction] When Compass of the Grand Lodge enters play, choose one: Hand, Arcane, Accessory. You gain 1 additional slot of the chosen type.
[reaction] When you play an asset that fills a slot of the chosen type, exhaust Compass of the Grand Lodge: You get +1 to each of your skills until the end of the round.

name: Across Dreadful Waters
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is equal to the current Act #.
[cultist]: -X. X is equal to half the amount of doom in play (rounded up).
[tablet]: -2. If this test fails, discard a card from your hand at random.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you have 3 or fewer player cards in your hand, take 1 horror.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 1 more than the current Act #.
[cultist]: -X. X is equal to the amount of doom in play.
[tablet]: -3. If this test fails, discard a card from your hand at random.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you have 4 or fewer player cards in your hand, take 1 horror.

name: Lingering Fatigue
text: Revelation - Put Lingering Fatigue into play in your threat area. Forced - When one of your cards would be removed from the game by a scenario card effect: Take 1 damage or 1 horror (choose one). [action][action]: Discard Lingering Fatigue

name: Blood From Stones
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 1 for every 5 [[Notice]] in your Campaign Log (rounded down).
[cultist]: -2. If you are performing a test against a [[Conspirator]] enemy, you must either take 1 damage or this token becomes -4 instead.
[tablet]: -2. If you are performing a test on a [[Paradox]] card, you must either take 1 horror or this token becomes -4 instead.
[elder_thing]: -3. -5 instead if you are at a [[Non-Euclidean]] location.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 1 for every 4 [[Notice]] in your Campaign Log (rounded down).
[cultist]: -3. If you are performing a test against a [[Conspirator]] enemy, you must either take 1 damage or this token becomes -5 instead.
[tablet]: -3. If you are performing a test on a [[Paradox]] card, you must either take 1 horror or this token becomes -5 instead.
[elder_thing]: -4. -6 instead if you are at a [[Non-Euclidean]] location.

flavor: This strange glypth gleaned from the masonic renegades has given you an advantage in keeping the universe in order.
name: Immutable Sigil
text:
[reaction] When a scenario effect would remove any amount of cards from an investigator's hand, play area, or deck from the game: Remove 1 fewer card from the game.
[reaction] If Immutable Sigil would be removed from the game by a scenario effect: Draw it, instead

name: Pyroclastic Flow
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -2. This token gets -1 for each non-Euclidean effect on your location.
[cultist]: -3. If you fail, remove the top card of your deck from the game.
[tablet]: -2. If you fail, after this test resolves, move to a connecting location.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail and you have fewer than 4 player cards in your hand, take 1 horror.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -3. This token gets -1 for each non-Euclidean effect on your location.
[cultist]: -4. If you fail, remove the top card of your deck from the game.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, after this test resolves, move to a connecting location.
[elder_thing]: -5. If you fail and you have fewer than 4 player cards in your hand, take 1 horror.

name: Tomb of Dead Dreams
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 1 plus the number of Inescapable Reach cards in play.
[cultist]: -3. If the orientation of your location and your investigator mini-card do not match, take 1 horror.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, after this test resolves, rotate your investigator mini-card 90 degrees clockwise or counter-clockwise.
[elder_thing]: -3. If Cthulhu is at your location, this test automatically fails instead.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 2 plus the number of Inescapable Reach cards in play.
[cultist]: -4. If the orientation of your location and your investigator mini-card do not match, take 1 horror.
[tablet]: -4. If you fail, after this test resolves, rotate your investigator mini-card 90 degrees clockwise or counter-clockwise.
[elder_thing]: -4. If Cthulhu is at your location, this test automatically fails instead.
